QuestData.Title: Seeker of Truth
QuestData.Description: These miners are far too stupid to concoct any type of escape plan. We must find and punish the source. Venture into the depths of the mine and seek out the Murkblood overseers. If they have not been overcome by the denizens of the mine, they will undoubtedly be hiding.$B$BOnce you locate one, interrogate him until he reveals the true mastermind behind the escape. Return to me with the identity of this traitor and the hand of the overseer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a Murkblood Overseer and interrogate him. Return to the Mistress of the Mines with the Murkblood information and the Hand of the Overseer.
QuestData.RewardText: Nothing to say? Perhaps as he lies bleeding to death on the floor of this cursed mine he will remember... Remember what it means to cross the forces of Illidan!.
